title: Banco Santander global operations : geographic diversification of profit 2019
summary: This bar chart has 3 columns on the x axis representing Region, and Share of attributable profit in each Region on the y axis.
The Share of attributable profit is highest at Region Europe and lowest at Region North America.
The difference of Share of attributable profit between the highest and lowest Region is 31.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Region in the x axis and Share of attributable profit in the y axis.
The Share of attributable profit is highest at Region Europe and lowest at Region North America.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 3 columns on the x axis representing Region, and Share of attributable profit in each Region on the y axis.
The Share of attributable profit is highest at Region Europe and lowest at Region North America.
The difference of Share of attributable profit between the highest and lowest Region is 31.0.
max_summary: This bar chart has 3 columns on the x axis representing Region, and Share of attributable profit in each Region on the y axis.
The Share of attributable profit is appeared to be the highest at Region Europe and lowest at Region North America.
The maximum Region Europe has got 2.94 times higher Share of attributable profit than the minimum Region North America.
The Region Europe tends to be 1.41 percent higher than average.
Summing up the values of all Regions, we get total 100.0.
